text.3_Chapter, 17_Verse, 0_Comment: water courses - A place from which water emanates
text.3_Chapter, 17_Verse, 1_Comment: and will water the Valley of Shittim - As its meaning implies -it will water the Valley of Shittim. Its midrashic meaning is that it will atone for the sin of Peor (see Zechariah 14)
